org.opends.server.protocols.http

Class HTTPStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.protocols.ldap.LDAPStatistics
        • org.opends.server.protocols.http.HTTPStatistics

  • public class HTTPStatistics
extends LDAPStatistics
    Collects statistics for HTTP. This class inherits from LDAPStatistics to show the administrator how the underlying LDAP internal operations are performing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTTPStatistics(java.lang.String instanceName)
      Constructor for this class.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRequest(java.lang.String httpMethod)
      Adds a request to the stats using the provided HTTP method.
      void clearStatistics()
      Clears any statistical information collected to this point.
      java.util.List<Attribute> getMonitorData()
      Retrieves a set of attributes containing monitor data that should be returned to the client if the corresponding monitor entry is requested.
      void updateRequestMonitoringData(java.lang.String httpMethod, long time)
      Adds to the total time of an HTTP request method.
